backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report describing a feature request and its associated components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise descriptions of all major frontend components and assets.
frontend/cleanup-notes-non-frontend.md: Audit notes for non‑frontend files, recommending verification before deleting root-level artifacts.
frontend/cleanup-report.md: Report detailing kept frontend assets and a list of deleted unused files with reasons.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/README-assets.md: Documentation of background images and background‑music.mp3, including playback behavior, browser compatibility, and diagnostics.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with the error boundary and background audio provider.
frontend/src/assets/staticAssets.ts: Exports paths for the three background images used by each page.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary displaying a fallback UI and refresh option on runtime errors.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundAudioP: Context provider managing autoplay, gesture-based playback, mute toggle, local file selection, and audio state syncing.
frontend/src/components/CornerAudioPicke: Provides a button to pick a local audio file, validates it, and shows status and selected filename.
frontend/src/components/EnterWebsiteGate: Shows an entry screen with animations and triggers audio on user gesture before revealing children.
frontend/src/components/FullscreenBackgr: Renders a fullscreen background image with an overlay and displays child content on top.
frontend/src/components/RomanticButton.t: A stylized button component with adjustable size used for romantic-themed UI actions.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Wraps the app layout and renders routed content via an Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling auth client creation, login state, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom colors, fonts, and animations used across the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Shows the final message page with long romantic text over a fullscreen background.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Displays an intro screen with delayed CTA, wrapped in an entry gate and background image.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Shows a proposal prompt with a YES button that navigates to the final page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, border radii, animations, and plugins for the app’s styling.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, existing issues, and feature requests related to restoring default background music behavior.
